Information.Subtext: Comments on how to use this driver.
Indicates if the card is working as a dual channel distribution amplifier. (using only one source, or using multiple sources) (A to A and B or B to A and B)
Indicates the way the inputs are used. A to A and B to B or A to B and B to A

Param.Name: buttonRemoveVirtualAConnections
Param.Message: Are you sure you want to remove this virtual connection?

Information.Subtext: This is a Value saved with a connection that can be used by the DataMiner Client to perform Path Highlighting in Visio's that have the same filter.
The unique key of the input interface.
The key of the selected item.
The value for a property that will be put on Interface. There can be many properties, this example only has 2.
The value for a property that will be put on Interface. There can be many properties, this example only has 2.
This displays the result from trying to retrieve the interfaces from DCF data

Param.Name: buttonFindInterface

Information.Subtext: Writes all matrix interfaces to the element log
